name: Gmail gradients for buttons and message headers
description:
A gradient header helps visually divide one message from the next.
The gradients for buttons need a bit more roundedness.
additional_info:
I moved the gradient header from another style (at http://userstyles.org/styles/62621/gmail-messages-rounded-and-compressed ) and these separate styles now work separately or together.

* Adjusted the gradient to be almost entirely transparent, so background color from the theme provides the button color.
